aom.scripting.ui

Class TimelineGadget

  • Object
    • AbstractGadget
      • TimelineGadget

  • public class TimelineGadget
extends AbstractGadget
    Defines a Timeline Gadget, like the one used in postgame.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
    Note
    Because almost all functionality is hardcoded, it's doubtful this component can be reused anywhere else.
